text: Glauk Konjufca (born 25 July 1981) is a Kosovan activist, journalist and politician. He has been the Chairman of the Assembly since 22 March 2021. He was acting President of Kosovo from 22 March 2021 until the election of Vjosa Osmani on 4 April 2021.. ==References== Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Kosovo Category:Journalists
title: Glauk Konjufca
